data.name: Roses Of Love
data.detailed_description:
About the game


Roses of love is a visual novel by Yuri in which you will have to take the role of Akane, and meet the possible protagonist's love couples.
Choose well and unlock alternative routes to discover the past of the protagonist's possible couples and help them to be happy.

Story


"Congratulations on entering the prestigious Aoi Ladies Academy"

Akane is a country girl who dreams of studying at the prestigious Aoi Ladies Academy; there Akane will meet Hoshiko a girl born into a wealthy family, Eri a young aspiring pastry chef and Chizuru, who dreams of being the best swimmer in all of Japan. Akane will enjoy her school life and get to know the feelings of each of them. Little by little Akane will begin to realize something that may change her relationship with her friends. And this is "love?" find out in this story full of Romance and Comedy.

Staff

  • Story, Code, UI: Neyunse
  • Dialogue corrections: Only Beep

Special Thanks

  • Suki (English translator)

Credits

  • temporal backgrounds: NoranekoGames and Selavi Games
  • temporal Sprites: NoranekoGames
  • temporal Music: Souichi Sakagami(Trial & Error) and Kevin MacLeod

data.short_description: In this visual novel you will be immersed in the story of Akane, a girl who wanted to fulfill her dream of studying in the great city of Tokyo. Here Akane will find love and new friendships, support her in her search for romance and discover a side of her that never expected.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.15+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
